Freeze-dried live attenuate measles rubella combine vaccine ( Schwarz FF-8 strain/TO-336 strain ) dissolve 0.7 mL accompany reconstitution fluid ( water injection [ Japanese Pharmacopoeia ] ) , wherein 0.5-mL portion typically administer subcutaneously single dose . In addition , freeze-dried live attenuate measles rubella combine vaccine ( Schwarz FF-8 strain/TO-336 strain ) use accordance `` Regulations Vaccination '' `` Guidelines Routine Vaccination . ''
